S08n685:1: atha khalu vajrapāṇirguhyakādhipatiḥ sarvāvantaṃ mahāparṣanmaṇḍala mavalokya sarvāṃstāṃ śuddhāvāsopariniṣaṇṇāṃ bhūtasaṅghānāmantrayate sma |
S08n685:2: śṛṇvantu bhavanto mārṣā yamāntakasya krodharājasyāparimitabalaparākramasya durdāntadamakasya vaivasvatajīvitāntakarasya duṣṭasattvanigrahatatparasya mahābodhisattvasya mañjuśriyabhāṣitasya mahābodhisattvasyādau tāvat paṭavidhānaṃ bhavati ||
S08n685:3: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate |
S08n685:6: śmaśāne mṛtakaṃ prāpya brāhmaṇasya ambaraṃ tam ||
S08n685:7: gṛhya tato rātrau asṛṇāṃ raṅgayet tataḥ |
S08n685:9: krūraṃ citrakaraṃ kruddhaṃ bhīṣaṇe cāpi lekhayet |
S08n685:25: ūrdhvakeśaṃ sajālaṃ vai dhūmravarṇaṃ kvacit tathā |
S08n685:39: kārayet paṭavaramādau ante madhye ca pūjanā |
S08n685:40: parisphuṭaṃ tu phaṭaṃ kṛtvā vittaṃ dattvā tu śilpine ||
S08n685:41: prabhūtaṃ cāpi mūlyaṃ vai yena vā tuṣyate sadā |
S08n685:42: avadhyaṃ tasya kartavyaṃ dharmaṃ cāpi sahābhayam |
S08n685:44: saphalaṃ śilpine karma nirāmiṣaṃ cāpi varjayet ||
S08n685:46: mahārakṣā ca kartavyā anyathā mṛyate hyasau ||
S08n685:49: parisphuṭaṃ tu paṭaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā vā manasepsitam |
S08n685:50: sarvāṃ ca kārayet karmāṃ raudrāṃ śatrūpaghātakām ||
S08n685:51: gṛhya paṭavaraṃ gacched yatheṣṭaṃ yatra vāñchitam |
S08n685:56: jāpināṃ nindakā ye ca teṣāṃ caiva parābhavā ||
S08n685:59: teṣāṃ tu karma prayuñjīta sadyaḥ prāṇoparodhinam |
S08n685:64: gṛhya sarvaṃ samāyuktaṃ paṭaṃ sthāpya vivekataḥ ||
S08n685:70: baddhvā śūlamudraṃ tu sarvakarmeṣu vā iha ||
S08n685:72: prathame putramaraṇaṃ sattve prāpte tu taṃ bhavet ||
S08n685:73: dvitīye cāpi bhāryā vai pārṣadyāḥ sanāyakāḥ |
S08n685:74: tṛtīye maraṇaṃ tasya yasyoddiśyaṃ hi tat kṛtam ||
S08n685:81: dehaṃ śuṣyati sarvaṃ vai tasya rājño na saṃśayaḥ |
S08n685:83: dhṛtiṃ na labhate śayyāṃ āvartaṃ ca mahītale |
S08n685:86: aśaktā rakṣituṃ tasya maheśvarādyā bhuvi devatā ||
S08n685:89: duṣṭāre mānine kruddhe tadantaṃ tasya jīvitam |
S08n685:90: ardharātre tu madhyāhne bhāṣito yatra jāpinaḥ ||
S08n685:92: yatheṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe ca paṭaṃ saṃsthāpya mahītale ||
S08n685:94: ekavṛkṣe tathā liṅge śaile prānte guhāsu vā ||
S08n685:96: mahāraṇye vivikte ca śūnye devakuleṣu ca ||
S08n685:98: tatra deśe samīpe vā tatrasthe vā yathepsitam ||
S08n685:104: acintyaṃ dṛśyate karma phalaṃ cāpi acintyakam ||
S08n685:107: acintyaṃ rūpiṇāṃ siddhi dṛśyate ha mahītale |
S08n685:109: kiṃ punarlokikā mantrāḥ sagrahā mātarāśca tāḥ |
S08n685:110: īśānaśca saviṣṇurvā sa ca skando purandaraḥ ||
S08n685:114: aśaktā rakṣayituṃ te'pi samayaṃ taiḥ purā kṛtam ||
S08n685:118: yadā prasannamanasaḥ karuṇārdrā va bhavet kadā ||
S08n685:120: tadādau labhate śāntiṃ dhṛtiṃ vā jīvadhāraṇam ||
S08n685:122: rudhiraṃ mānuṣaṃ māṃsaṃ lavaṇaṃ trikaṭukaṃ punaḥ ||
S08n685:124: dhurdhūrakasya tu mūlāni kośātakyā tathaiva ca ||
S08n685:128: sarvānyetāni samaṃ kṛtvā juhuyāt agnau paṭasannidhau ||
S08n685:130: sarvāṃ vā rājikāṃ hanyā pāriṣadyāṃ śubhāśubhām ||
S08n685:131: samūloddharaṇaṃ tasya dvitīye sandhye tu juhvatā |
S08n685:133: durbhikṣaṃ bhavate tasya jane cāpi sanaigame |
S08n685:136: janapadaṃ deśaviṣayaṃ vā yavāḥ tasya narādhipe ||
S08n685:145: dvirātre saptarātre vā maraṇaṃ tasya jīvitam |
S08n685:146: yo yasya devatābhaktaḥ nakṣatro vā nāmato likhet ||
S08n685:151: paśunā hanyate cāpi vyaṅgo vā bhavate punaḥ |
S08n685:158: sarvāṃ yakṣagaṇāṃ mantraḥ yakṣīṇāṃ ca sa sarvataḥ ||
S08n685:162: maithunārthī yadā mantrī rāgāndho vātha mūḍhadhīḥ ||
S08n685:172: te nirvṛtā sarvapāpā tu tridhā doṣanivartitā ||
S08n685:174: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrād ekūnapañcāśatimaḥ yamāntakakrodharājābhicārukaniyamaḥ dvitīyaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ parisamāptaḥ |
